title: Report: MRI shows KC's Charles has torn ACL
text: Keiser Report: Global Paradox of Risk (E820) 25:40 In this episode of the Keiser Report, Max Keiser and Stacy Herbert discuss the fact that, now that the statute of limitations for Global Financial Crisis banking crimes has passed, Ben Bernanke has his Come to Jesus moment. In the second half, Max interviews Charles Hugh Smith of OfTwoMinds.com about... Recent related news Chiefs will now have to go on without their offensive centerpiece.
